description:
Roggenrola, known as the Mantle Pokémon, is a blue rock-like Pokémon with a yellow hexagonal "ear". It has brown feet, and a brown rocky figure extending from the top of its body. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel. They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
Roggenrola made its` anime debut in "Gotta Catch a Roggenrola" where Ash Ketchum caught one after using his Tepig to catch one. It later evolved into Boldore in "Battling the King of the Mines" while battling Clay`s Excadrill.
In the Pokémon Master Black & White manga, Monta uses a Roggenrola against Cheren in a triple battle.
name: Dangoro
